Shadow Star:  Very well.

He follows Tyrael (on the assumption he's now heading to Naga).

OOC: I plan for Shadow Star to get a lizard beast mode when we get 
there then the Inferno will turn him into a black dragon.  Although 
he is already a Transmetal.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Yup, Naga's a guy. By the way, is SS still a black dragon?
> 
> Tyrael: I approve. He knows me, so it is likely he will take the 
offer 
> easily, but I think it will be better if you come with me. After 
all, 
> you will be his officer, and you should know your men.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "dewboy30816" <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> > Thinking again:  Then I wonder what you'd do if you could see how 
> > wicked my spark is.
> > 
> > Shadow Star:  the let us get this Naga and see if he has any 
> > suggestions for our crew (it's a he right?).
> >

have

escapade?

> > Tripredacus

means
